title: Length of Last Word
description: Given a string s consisting of words and spaces, return the length of the last word in the string. A word is a maximal substring consisting of non-space characters only.   Example 1: Input: s = "Hello World" Output: 5 Explanation: The last word is "World" with length 5. Example 2: Input: s = " fly me to the moon " Output: 4 Explanation: The last word is "moon" with length 4. Example 3: Input: s = "luffy is still joyboy" Output: 6 Explanation: The last word is "joyboy" with length 6.   Constraints: 1 <= s.length <= 104 s consists of only English letters and spaces ' '. There will be at least one word in s.
examples: Input: s = "Hello World" Output: 5 Explanation: The last word is "World" with length 5.
Input: s = " fly me to the moon " Output: 4 Explanation: The last word is "moon" with length 4.
Input: s = "luffy is still joyboy" Output: 6 Explanation: The last word is "joyboy" with length 6.
